00033 IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr getGlobalTransformAlongPath(Node::NodePath nodePath){
00034         IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr result(new HomogeneousMatrix44()); //identity matrix
00035         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < static_cast<unsigned int>(nodePath.size()); ++i) {
00036                 Transform* tmpTransform = dynamic_cast<Transform*>(nodePath[i]);
00037                 if (tmpTransform) {
00038                         *result = *( (*result) * (*tmpTransform->getLatestTransform()) );
00039                 }
00040         }
00041         return result;
00042 }
00043 
00044 IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr getGlobalTransform(Node::NodePtr node) {
00045         IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr result(new HomogeneousMatrix44()); //identity matrix
00046         IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr accumulatedTransform;
00047 
00048         /* accumulate parent paths and take the _first_ found path  */
00049         PathCollector* pathCollector = new PathCollector();
00050         node->accept(pathCollector);
00051         if (static_cast<unsigned int>(pathCollector->getNodePaths().size()) > 0) { // != root
00052                 *result = *((*result) * (*(getGlobalTransformAlongPath(pathCollector->getNodePaths()[0]))));
00053                 if (static_cast<unsigned int>(pathCollector->getNodePaths().size()) > 1) {
00054                         LOG(WARNING) << "Multiple transform paths to this node detected. Taking fist path and ignoring the rest.";
00055                 }
00056         }
00057 
00058         /* check if node is a transform on its own ... */
00059         Transform::TransformPtr tmpTransform = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<Transform>(node);
00060         if (tmpTransform) {
00061                 *result = *( (*result) * (*tmpTransform->getLatestTransform()) );
00062         }
00063 
00064         delete pathCollector;
00065         return result;
00066 }
00067 
00068 IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr getTransformBetweenNodes(Node::NodePtr node, Node::NodePtr referenceNode) {
00069         IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr result(new HomogeneousMatrix44()); //identity matrix
00070         IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr rootToNodeTransform = getGlobalTransform(node);
00071         IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr rootToReferenceNodeTransform = getGlobalTransform(referenceNode);
00072 
00073 //      std::cout << "rootToNodeTransform :" << std::endl << *rootToNodeTransform << std::endl;
00074 //      std::cout << "rootToReferenceNodeTransform :" << std::endl << *rootToReferenceNodeTransform << std::endl;
00075 
00076         rootToReferenceNodeTransform->inverse();
00077 //      std::cout << "rootToReferenceNodeTransform inversed :" << std::endl << *rootToReferenceNodeTransform << std::endl;
00078 
00079         *result = *( (*rootToReferenceNodeTransform) * (*rootToNodeTransform) ); //cf. Craig p39
00080 //      std::cout << "result :" << std::endl << *result << std::endl;
00081 
00082         return result;
00083 }

00086 Transform::Transform() : maxHistoryDuration(dafaultMaxHistoryDuration), updateCount(0) {
00087 #ifdef STATIC_TRANSFORM
00088         history.resize(1);
00089 #else
00090         history.clear();
00091 #endif
00092 }

00094 Transform::~Transform() {
00095 #ifdef STATIC_TRANSFORM
00096         history.clear();
00097 #else
00098         history.clear();
00099 #endif
00100 }

00102 void Transform::insertTransform(IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr newTransform, TimeStamp timeStamp) {
00103         assert(newTransform != 0);
00104 #ifdef STATIC_TRANSFORM
00105         history[0].first = newTransform;
00106         history[0].second = timeStamp;
00107 #else
00108 
00109         /* history policy: descending order of timestamps (the older the closer to the end - like humans...)
00110          *  latest              oldest
00111          *   |-------------------|
00112          *  begin               end
00113          */
00114 
00115         historyIterator = history.begin();
00116 
00117         /* insert new data at its correct place in time */
00118         while(historyIterator != history.end()) { // loop over history
00119                 if (historyIterator->second <= timeStamp) {
00120                         break;
00121                 }
00122                 historyIterator++;
00123         }
00124         history.insert(historyIterator, std::make_pair(newTransform, timeStamp)); // fit into correct temporal place
00125 
00126 
00127         /*
00128          * in this case the temporal reference is deduced from the stored data and not
00129          * from the current (real) time.
00130          */
00131         historyIterator = history.begin(); // we already know that there is already one element...
00132         TimeStamp latestTimeStamp = history.begin()->second;
00133         deleteOutdatedTransforms(latestTimeStamp);
00134         updateCount ++;
00135 #endif
00136 }
00137 
00138 void Transform::deleteOutdatedTransforms(TimeStamp latestTimeStamp) {
00139         /*
00140          * delete all transforms where the durartion (delta between latestTime and stored) exeeds
00141          * the defined maximum history duration
00142          */
00143         while(!history.empty() && (history.back().second + maxHistoryDuration < latestTimeStamp)) {
00144                 history.pop_back();
00145         }
00146 }
00147 
00148 HistoryIterator Transform::getClosestTransform(TimeStamp timeStamp) {
00149         HistoryIterator resultIterator;
00150         HistoryIterator previousIterator; //remember: values have a decending order
00151         resultIterator = history.begin();
00152 
00153         if(getCurrentHistoryLenght() == 1) { // special case for first element -> just return it
00154                 return resultIterator;
00155         }
00156 
00157         while(resultIterator != history.end()) { // loop over history
00158                 if (timeStamp >= resultIterator->second) {
00159                         if(resultIterator != history.begin()) { // i.e. a previous element exists => copare wich is actually the closest
00160                                 previousIterator = resultIterator - 1;
00161                                 if ( (previousIterator->second - timeStamp) <= (timeStamp - resultIterator->second) ) {
00162                                         return previousIterator;
00163                                 } else {
00164                                         return resultIterator;
00165                                 }
00166                         } else {
00167                                 return resultIterator;
00168                         }
00169                 }
00170                 resultIterator++;
00171         }
00172 
00173         /*
00174          * We might reach this line when timeStamp is older thant the oldest element in the history.
00175          * In that case we want to return the last/oldest element.
00176          */
00177         if(getCurrentHistoryLenght() > 1) {
00178                 resultIterator = history.end() - 1;
00179                 assert(timeStamp < resultIterator->second); // just to be sure...
00180         }
00181         return resultIterator;
00182 }
00183 
00184 IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr  Transform::getTransform(TimeStamp timeStamp) {
00185 #ifdef STATIC_TRANSFORM
00186         return history[0].first;
00187 #else
00188         HistoryIterator closestTransform = getClosestTransform(timeStamp);
00189         if(closestTransform == history.end()) {
00190                 LOG(WARNING) << "Transform history for node " << this->getId() << " is empty. Cannot find a transform for time stamp ";// << timeStamp;
00191                 return IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr(); // should be kind of null...
00192                 // TODO throw exception instead?
00193         }
00194         return closestTransform->first;
00195 #endif
00196 }
00197 
00198 IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr Transform::getLatestTransform(){
00199 #ifdef STATIC_TRANSFORM
00200         return history[0].first;
00201 #else
00202         historyIterator = history.begin();
00203         if(historyIterator == history.end()) {
00204                 LOG(WARNING) << "Transform history for node " << this->getId() << " is empty. Cannot find latest transform.";// << timeStamp;
00205                 return IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr(); // should be kind of null...
00206                 // TODO throw exception instead?
00207         }
00208         return historyIterator->first;
00209 #endif
00210 }

00212 TimeStamp Transform::getMaxHistoryDuration() {
00213     return maxHistoryDuration;
00214 }

00216 void Transform::setMaxHistoryDuration(TimeStamp maxHistoryDuration) {
00217     this->maxHistoryDuration = maxHistoryDuration;
00218 }

00220 unsigned int Transform::getCurrentHistoryLenght() {
00221         return static_cast<unsigned int>(history.size());
00222 }
00223 
00224 TimeStamp Transform::getLatestTimeStamp() {
00225         historyIterator = history.begin();
00226         if(historyIterator == history.end()) {
00227                 LOG(WARNING) << "Transform history for node " << this->getId() << " is empty. Cannot find latest time stamp.";// << timeStamp;
00228                 return TimeStamp(0.0);
00229         }
00230         return history.front().second;
00231 }
00232 
00233 TimeStamp Transform::getOldestTimeStamp() {
00234         historyIterator = history.begin();
00235         if(historyIterator == history.end()) {
00236                 LOG(WARNING) << "Transform history for node " << this->getId() << " is empty. Cannot find oldest time stamp.";// << timeStamp;
00237                 return TimeStamp(0.0);
00238         }
00239         return history.back().second;
00240 }

00242 unsigned int Transform::getUpdateCount() {
00243     return updateCount;
00244 }
00245 
00246 void Transform::accept(INodeVisitor* visitor){
00247         visitor->visit(this);
00248         if (visitor->getDirection() == INodeVisitor::upwards) { //TODO move to "traverseUpwards" method?
00249             for(unsigned i = 0; i < getNumberOfParents(); ++i) // recursively go up the graph structure
00250             {
00251                 getParent(i)->accept(visitor);
00252             }
00253         } else if (visitor->getDirection() == INodeVisitor::downwards) { //TODO move to "traverseDownwards" method?
00254                 for(unsigned i = 0; i < getNumberOfChildren(); ++i) // recursively go down the graph structure
00255                 {
00256                         getChild(i)->accept(visitor);
00257                 }
00258         }
00259 }
